title: L&T bags multiple orders in India, Middle East
description: Larsen & Toubro announced on Wednesday that its power transmission and distribution business has secured significant orders both in the domestic market and the Middle East. These orders fall in the category of large orders, ranging between Rs 2,500 crore and Rs 5,000 crore.
